text: Born to Kill is a 1947 American crime drama movie directed by Robert Wise and based on the 1943 novel Deadlier than the Male by James Gunn. It stars Lawrence Tierney, Walter Slezak, Claire Trevor, Isabel Jewell, Esther Howard and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Wise Category:Movies set in Nevada
title: Born to Kill (1947 movie)
